pages.text: Raccoons are Passive Mobs that live in Multiple Forests, there are 7 Colour Variants and each have unique Forest Spawns$(li)Grey Racoons - Oak/Birch$(li)Brown Raccoons - Dark Oak$(li)Red Raccoons - Taiga$(li)Black Raccoons - Ash$(li)Blue Raccoons - Mystical$(li)White Raccoons - Snowy$(li)Gold Raccoons - Do not spawn, these are a very rare breed between 2 other Raccoons.$(br2)Raccoons cannot be tamed but can be bred with Sweet Berries
